text: int main ( ) { int t , i , j , k , n ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < t ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int * * a = ( int * * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) a [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( k = 0 ; k < n ; k ++ ) a [ i ] [ k ] = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( k = 0 ; k < i + 1 ; k ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ k ] ) ; int * * b = ( int * * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) b [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( k = 0 ; k < n ; k ++ ) b [ i ] [ k ] = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) b [ n - 1 ] [ i ] = a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] ; for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) for ( k = 0 ; k <= i ; k ++ ) b [ i ] [ k ] = a [ i ] [ k ] + ( b [ i + 1 ] [ k ] >= b [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ? b [ i + 1 ] [ k ] : b [ i + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , b [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
